values:
So im writing in here because i am almost positive no one will read this...and if you do just dont because im only writing because i need to and i dont know how to make it private


So basically today sucks...im sick of being ditched by my friends....ok this is selfish i know but i am the type of person who needs attention...as said in church my love type is attention...i dont feel loved if i dont get to talk/hang out with people...i cant help it...i wish i could but whenever someone asks if i wanna do something and i say yes that usually means your going to do something...not that oh well im using you as a back up for if i dont find other plans...so therefore i keep my day free so that i can hang out when you just completely ditch me because you found something "better" to do...i hate this so much cause i dont know why i feel like this...i always doubt everything and i wish i wouldnt...and its not just some people its my normal friends...i know she has other friends but whenever shed ask to hang out i always say sure...even if i dont want to i always say alright...but if i ask its..oh im going to watch a movie at angelas...never, well i called angela bout watchin a movie wanna come to?...i know i shouldnt care but i hate feeling lonely and right now for some reason thats all i feel...im use to always having someone...and if i didnt have someone i always had guard....now i dont even have that...however sad that is that was the one and only thing ive ever been good at...thats the only time ive ever been able to make friends...that was my one stable thing i had that wouldnt leave like all the rest of my friends...but i dont have it anymore and honestly i dont know what to do...i hate feeling like this all the time...i hate always saying im alright and then coming home and feeling lonely...i hate crying...i use to never cry and now its all i ever want to do...but i cant because its pointless...i have no reason to cry...my familys normal i have enough money to get by with school i have a good oldfasioned nice life...but i just feel empty...and i hate that i dont know why!...ive tried everything to feel whole...tried making friends didnt work...tried having an actual relationship, never happened...i just dont feel loved and i know i should...my parents love me even though they dont know how to show it...my friends love me even though sometimes i feel like the only reason they are there is because they have no one else...i just wish and pray that for once in my life i could be someones priority...ive always been the back up...ive always been the one who is there, oh im bored, sams always home ill call her...never well i should do my homework but ill hang with sam instead because i know shes had a bad day...theres only been once in my life that someones actually been there for me when she was supposed to be somewhere else...thats all ive ever wanted...just to have someone drop everything for me...just for once...i wanna know what it feels like to be honestly genuinly loved...the kinda love where ill be sick and theyll bring me food and force me to eat it even though i dont want to...the kinda love where ill say im lonely and 5 minutes later no matter what was going on theyll be sitting right next to me...i just want an actual relationship for once...yes i said it...the one who said shed be fine without a man, the one that swore shed never cry over a guy, the one who tells everyone else relationships are pointless...maybe thats the whole i have...a whole left there for someone who will actually care
im sick of going 19 years of my life without even once..not once..having a relationship...call me shallow but i wanna be loved

and right now im just being stupid...because i want someone there so im sticking with something that i know i shouldnt...i know it will never work...and i know that im just going to get hurt big time...and i know its not right and its not me...but im sick of being alone...i know i should stop doing this to myself but i dont know how...you might think its easy to just drop someone but its the hardest thing in the world to do...specially when thats the only person i can and do hang out with...i hate being alone and without him i would be alone every night...its probably better for me to be alone right now because things cant get better they are just going to get worse...because i know he doesnt like me...hes just being like this because he has no one else...like always im a back up...and i dont wanna be a back up but im afraid to end it cause then ill be alone...so basically im using him because i feel alone...which is wrong on my part by far but i cant help it...i need someone there...i dont have my stability anymore..im a loser but my stability was guard, always something i could do when i started to feel alone...and well now thats gone and i cant get a job and i suck at school so i got nothing but him...i would give anything in the world to just find something i could be good at and i could spend my time doing...but everything i do i suck at...i suck at being a daughter cause i can never make my parents happy, i do shitty in school and waste their money, i cant clean the house well enough, i cant have a family, i cant even get a fucking date, i cant get a job, i cant be happy, i cant stay healthy and be there for them forever

ok so thats my rant for the day...plus i havta go to the hospital agian which is pointless because they are just going to say the same thing they always say...ill get poked and proded for no reason...wasting even more money...why cant i just be normal and healthy instead of taking a bizillion pills and hiding everything...well today just sucks!

Life sucks...it just plain sucks...
so as soon as i get out of highschool i think things are going to be better but NO everything hasta SUCK...
it seems like everyone i care about is leaving...my dog is dieing my grandma is dieing my dad is leaving joanna is leaving issac is leaving josh is already gone... stacey wont even talk to me anymore steve jessi and haley are going back to college bens too caught up with his girlfriend to care anymore which isnt a bad thing cause at least he is happy i never get to talk to meredith and ben brown anymore...jennys gone right now but she will be back...the only friends i have left are her kt and riley and im not gonna dump my problems on them cause i know they have there own problems...so thats why im just writing this all on here cause no one reads this anyway and it helps me get it all out

RULES:
1. Pick your birth month from under the cut.
2. Strike out anything
that doesn't apply to you.
3. Bold the best that apply to you.
4. Copy to your own journal, with all twelve months under a cut.

________________________________________

FEBRUARY:

Abstract thoughts. Loves reality and abstract.

Intelligent and clever. Changing personality. Attractive. Sexy. Temperamental.

Quiet, shy and humble. Honest and loyal(to my friends). Determined to reach goals. Loves

freedom. Rebellious when restricted. Loves aggressiveness. Too sensitive and

easily hurt. Gets angry really easily but does not show it. Dislike unnecessary

things. Loves making friends but rarely shows it(?). Daring and stubborn.

Ambitious. Realizing dreams and hopes. Sharp. Loves entertainment and leisure.

Romantic on the inside not outside. Superstitious and ludicrous. Spendthrift.

Tries to learn to show emotions.

_________________________________________

JANUARY:
Stubborn and hard-hearted. Ambitious and serious. Loves to teach and
be taught. Always looking at people's flaws and weaknesses. Likes to criticize.
Hardworking and productive. Smart, neat and organized. Sensitive and has deep
thoughts. Knows how to make others happy. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Rather
reserved. Highly attentive. Resistant to illnesses but prone to colds. Romantic
but has difficulties expressing love. Loves children. Loyal. Has great social
abilities yet easily jealous. Very stubborn and money
cautious.

FEBRUARY:
Abstract thoughts. Loves reality and abstract.
Intelligent and clever. Changing personality. Attractive. Sexy. Temperamental.
Quiet, shy and humble. Honest and loyal. Determined to reach goals. Loves
freedom. Rebellious when restricted. Loves aggressiveness. Too sensitive and
easily hurt. Gets angry really easily but does not show it. Dislike unnecessary
things. Loves making friends but rarely shows it. Daring and stubborn.
Ambitious. Realizing dreams and hopes. Sharp. Loves entertainment and leisure.
Romantic on the inside not outside. Superstitious and ludicrous. Spendthrift.
Tries to learn to show emotions.

MARCH:
Attractive personality. Sexy.
Affectionate. Shy and reserved. Secretive. Naturally honest, generous and
sympathetic. Loves peace and serenity. Sensitive to others. Loves to serve
others. Easily angered. Trustworthy. Appreciative and returns kindness.
Observant and assesses others. Revengeful. Loves to dream and fantasize. Loves
traveling. Loves attention. Hasty decisions in choosing partners. Loves home
decors. Musically talented. Loves special things. Moody.

APRIL:
Active
and dynamic. Decisive and hasty but tends to regret. Attractive and affectionate
to oneself. Strong mentality. Loves attention. Diplomatic. Consoling, friendly
and solves people's problems. Brave and fearless. Adventurous. Loving and
caring. Suave and! generou s. Emotional. Aggressive. Hasty. Good memory. Moving
Motivates oneself and others. Sickness usually of the head and chest. Sexy in a
way that only their lover can see.

MAY:
Stubborn and hard-hearted.
Strong-willed and highly motivated. Sharp thoughts. Easily angered. Attracts
others and loves attention. Deep feelings. Beautiful physically and mentally.
Firm Standpoint. Needs no motivation. Easily consoled. Systematic (left brain).
Loves to dream. Strong clairvoyance. Understanding. Sickness usually in the ear
and neck. Good imagination. Good physical. Weak breathing. Loves literature and
the arts. Loves traveling. Dislike being at home. Restless. Not having many
children. Hardworking. High spirited. Spendthrift.

JUNE:
Thinks far
with vision. Easily influenced by kindness. Polite and soft-spoken. Having lots
of ideas. Sensitive. Active mind. Hesitating, tends to delay. Choosy and always
wants the best. Temperamental. Funny and humorous. Loves to joke. Good debating
skills. Talkative. Daydreamer. Friendly. Knows how to make friends. Abiding.
Able to show character. Easily hurt. Prone to getting colds. Loves to dress up.
Easily bored. Fussy. Seldom shows emotions. Takes time to recover when hurt.
Brand conscious. Executive. Stubborn.

JULY:
Fun to be with. Secretive.
Difficult to fathom and to be understood. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Takes
pride in oneself. Has reputation. Easily consoled. Honest. Concerned about
people's feelings. Tactful. Friendly. Approachable. Emotional temperamental and
unpredictable. Moody and easily hurt. Witty and sparkly. Not revengeful.
Forgiving but never forgets. Dislikes nonsensical and unnecessary things. Guides
others physically and mentally. Sensitive and forms impressions carefully.
Caring and loving. Treats others equally. Strong sense of sympathy. Wary and
sharp. Judges people through observations. Hardworking. No difficulties in
studying.! Loves t o be alone. Always broods about the past and the old friends.
Likes to be quiet. Homely person. Waits for friends. Never looks for friends.
Not aggressive unless provoked. Prone to having stomach and dieting problems.
Loves to be loved. Easily hurt but takes long to
recover.


AUGUST:
Loves to joke. Attractive. Suave and caring.
Brave and fearless. Firm and has leadership qualities. Knows how to console
others. Too generous and egoistic. Takes high pride of oneself. Thirsty for
praises. Extraordinary spirit. Easily angered. Angry when provoked. Easily
jealous. Observant. Careful and cautious. Thinks quickly. Independent thoughts.
Loves to lead and to be led. Loves to dream. Talented in the arts, music and
defense. Sensitive but not petty. Poor resistance against illnesses. Learns to
relax. Hasty and trusty. Romantic. Loving and caring. Loves to make
friends.

SEPTEMBER:
Suave and compromising. Careful, cautious and
organized. Likes to point out people's mistakes. Likes to criticize. Stubborn.
Quiet but able to talk well. Calm and cool. Kind and sympathetic. Concerned and
detailed. Loyal but not always honest. Does work well. Very confident.
Sensitive. Thinking generous. Good memory. Clever and knowledgeable. Loves to
look for information. Must control oneself when criticizing. Able to motivate
oneself. Understanding. Fun to be around. Secretive. Loves sports, leisure and
traveling. Hardly shows emotions. Tends to bottle up feelings. Very choosy,
especially in relationships. Systematic.

OCTOBER:
Loves to chat. Loves
those who loves them. Loves to take things at the center. Inner and physical
beauty. Lies but doesn't pretend. Gets angry often. Treats friends importantly.
Always making friends. Easily hurt but recovers easily. Daydreamer. Opinionated.
Does not care of what others think. Emotional. Decisive. Strong clairvoyance.
Loves to travel, the arts and literature. Touchy an! d easily jealous. Concerned.
Loves outdoors. Just and fair. Spendthrift. Easily influenced. Easily loses
confidence. Loves children.

NOVEMBER:
Has a lot of ideas. Difficult to
fathom. Thinks forward. Unique and brilliant. Extraordinary ideas. Sharp
thinking. Fine and strong clairvoyance. Can become good doctors. Dynamic in
personality. Secretive. Inquisitive. Knows how to dig secrets. Always thinking.
Less talkative but amiable. Brave and generous. Patient. Stubborn and
hard-hearted. If there is a will, there is a way. Determined. Never give up.
Hardly becomes angry unless provoked. Loves to be alone. Thinks differently from
others. Sharp-minded. Motivates oneself. Does not appreciate praises.
High-spirited. Well-built and tough. Deep love and emotions. Romantic. Uncertain
in relationships. Homely. Hardworking. High abilities. Trustworthy. Honest and
keeps secrets. Not able to control emotions.
Unpredictable.

DECEMBER:
Loyal and generous. Sexy. Patriotic. Active
in games and interactions. Impatient and hasty. Ambitious. Influential in
organizations. Fun to be with. Loves to socialize. Loves praises. Loves
attention. Loves to be loved. Honest and trustworthy. Not pretending. Short
tempered. Changing personality. Not egoistic. Take high pride in oneself. Hates
restrictions. Loves to joke. Good sense of humor. Logical

I think perfectionism is based on the obsessive belief that if you run carefully enough, hitting each stepping-stone just right, you won't have to die. --Anne Lamott

Life is taken way to seriously sometimes. People need to learn how to live. How to express their feelings about others. They need to show that they care for others even when they dont think the other person cares back. People need to stop pretending to be people they arent. BE WHO YOU ARE!!! There is no point to live in a world where everyone is the same. I want to be different, to stand out in a crowd. I want to show the world who i am. People dont remember you by the way you act like others, they remember you for the way you act like yourself. I dont know about any of you but i wanna be remembered for who i really am. I want to impact a persons life! My goal in life is to not be famous but to change lifes. At least just one person. to make them relieze they dont have to act like everyone else to make them be happy. The greatest thing anyone has ever taught me is to be myself and i wanna pass that on....SO BE YOURSELF..

BE WHO YOU ARE AND NOT WHO SOMEONE ELSE WANTS YOU TO BE...

love ya all very much,

samm
